describe_explanation_description: The form consists of four sections, personal sections, general section and two uploading sections for files.
describe_cards_personalinfo_description: Fill out your full name, college and department.
describe_cards_personaldocs_description: Upload national residency card and other files.
describe_features_register_text: Students can register themselves in the easiest way.
describe_features_easy_text: Easy to understand secure and fast to use.
describe_features_location_text: Now you can find the location of your college.
